it.unibo.interfaces

Interface IReceiver

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ILocalReceiver, IRemoteReceiver
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LocalReceiver, LocalReceiverTrivial, Receiver, RemoteReceiver

    public interface IReceiver

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int countSubscribers() 
      void deleteSubscriber(IObserverEndpoint endpoint)
      Delete the endpoint from the subscribed endpoints
      void deleteSubscribers()
      Delete all subscribers from the channel
      IToken getLastToken() 
      void notifySubscribers(IToken token)
      Notify the endpoint (subscribers) for the availability of a new token in the channel
      void receive()
      Wait for a new notification in the channel and notify the subscribers when a new token is available in the channel
      void subscribe(IObserverEndpoint endpoint)
      Subscribe the provided endpoint in the channel

    • Method Detail

      • receive

        void receive()
        Wait for a new notification in the channel and notify the subscribers when a new token is available in the channel

      • getLastToken

        IToken getLastToken()
        Returns:
        the last token received in the channel

      • subscribe

        void subscribe(IObserverEndpoint endpoint)
        Subscribe the provided endpoint in the channel
        Parameters:
        endpoint - the observer to be subscribed

      • deleteSubscribers

        void deleteSubscribers()
        Delete all subscribers from the channel

      • deleteSubscriber

        void deleteSubscriber(IObserverEndpoint endpoint)
        Delete the endpoint from the subscribed endpoints
        Parameters:
        endpoint - The enpoint to unsubscribed

      • notifySubscribers

        void notifySubscribers(IToken token)
        Notify the endpoint (subscribers) for the availability of a new token in the channel
        Parameters:
        token - The new token available in the channel

      • countSubscribers

        int countSubscribers()
        Returns:
        the number of subscribers registered in the channel
